Rationale: This variant is designed to appeal broadly to businesses looking to leverage big data. Emphasizes the unique solution offered.
USPs: Transforms unusable data formats into LLM-ready JSON files; exclusive technology.
SuccessFramework: Simple, Unexpected, Concrete, Credible, Emotional, Stories

Elements.SelectorPath: div.framer-lcg8io > div.framer-1hhxdnu-container > div.framer-LWvIJ > div.framer-eqvlzw > div.framer-1rvem25 > h1.framer-text
Elements.Content: Enterprises are sitting on a gold mine of big data. The problem? 80% of it is in unusably messy formats like raw HTML, old PDFs, CRM data, XML, PPTX or DOCX. We’ve developed a tool that turns the messiest unstructured data into LLM-ready JSON files. It’s all we do, and we’re the only ones who do it.
Elements.OriginalText: 80% of enterprise data exists in difficult-to-use formats like HTML, PDF, CSV, PNG, PPTX, and more. Unstructured effortlessly extracts and transforms complex data for use with every major vector database and LLM framework.
